overview:
Drew is CEO and co-founder of Sparkpad, an open platform touch screen company that allows businesses to easily create custom experiences on internet-connected devices.

Prior to founding Sparkpad, Drew served as VP of Product Development at AOL and managed several of the company’s flagship consumer products, including its Internet Safety suite and AOL Instant Messenger (AIMÂ®) personalization features.

Prior to AOL, Drew managed editorial operations for the southwest region of Digital City, then the nation’s largest online city guide network, and co-founded a web design firm focused on developing web sites for local businesses.
